entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High 14 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 14 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
